hero.subtitle: Gastronomy & Live Music
hero.title: World Cuts,
hero.description: Premium meats carefully selected, prepared with technique and passion. In the heart of Cascais, we offer a unique gastronomic experience where meat excellence meets the vibrant energy of live music.

highlights.title: Premium Meats from Around the World
highlights.description: Each cut is a journey. We select the finest meats from different origins, aged and prepared with technical precision to enhance unique flavors.

items.title: Japanese Wagyu A5
items.description: Exceptional marbling, silky texture and intense flavor. A sublime experience for true connoisseurs.

items.title: Argentinian Black Angus
items.description: Raised on free-range pampas, this cut offers incomparable succulence and authentic robust flavor.

items.title: Aged Tomahawk
items.description: Impressive presentation, 45-day aging. A visual and gustatory spectacle at the table.

items.title: Brazilian Picanha
items.description: The South American classic at its finest. Juicy, flavorful and prepared with traditional technique.

liveMusic.title: Live Music,
liveMusic.description: Every week, we transform dinner into a memorable experience. Immersive sounds, intimate atmosphere and the unique vibe of Cascais at night.

items.name: Michael Thompson
items.text: Hands down the best Tomahawk I've had in Portugal. The atmosphere is sophisticated without being pretentious, and the live music creates the perfect vibe. We'll definitely be back.

items.name: Emma Richardson
items.text: We loved the experience! The Picanha was cooked to perfection and the service was attentive and professional. The evening atmosphere with live music is truly special.

items.name: David Santos
items.text: Exceptional meat quality. You can tell the careful selection and preparation technique. Highly recommend for special occasions in Cascais.

items.name: Laura Martinez
items.text: Welcoming atmosphere, interesting wine list and, of course, fantastic meats. The team knows their products well and helped us choose. Excellent find!
